message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe that's a fair price reflecting the true value of this item.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $140 is a more reasonable price for me.
